      • memo

        public Memo memo()
        Description copied from interface: Context
        Memo.

        The method returns a memo that represents the information from the memo of the repository current task is working in. All changes made by a step to this memo should be immediately translated to the memo of the repo.

        Specified by:
        memo in interface Context
        Returns:
        Memo of the running repo/transaction
